name: tailwindcss-line-clamp-no-ellipsis

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git commit -am "chore: update version to v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git commit -am "chore: update version to v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && git commit -am "chore: update version to v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
